OtherNode.tactic: if h₃ : i = j then simp [h₃] else if h₃ : i < j then let j' := j - i have t : j = i + j' := by omega generalize j' = j' at t subst t exact set_set_perm' _ _ (by omega) else rw [set_comm _ _ (by omega)] let i' := i - j have t : i = j + i' := by omega generalize i' = i' at t subst t apply set_set_perm' _ _ (by omega)

OtherNode.state_after: no goals

OtherNode.state_after: no goals

CommandDoccommentNode.comment: Variant of `List.Perm.take` specifying the the permutation is constant after `i` elementwise. -/

AtomNode.val: Variant of `List.Perm.take` specifying the the permutation is constant after `i` elementwise. -/

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), i ≤ j → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? ⊢ List.take i l₁ ~ List.take i l₂
OtherNode.state_after: α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), i ≤ j → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? ⊢ List.drop i l₁ = List.drop i l₂

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), i ≤ j → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? ⊢ List.drop i l₁ = List.drop i l₂
OtherNode.state_after: case h α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), i ≤ j → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? j : Nat ⊢ (List.drop i l₁)[j]? = (List.drop i l₂)[j]?

OtherNode.state_before: case h α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), i ≤ j → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? j : Nat ⊢ (List.drop i l₁)[j]? = (List.drop i l₂)[j]?
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), i ≤ j → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? j : Nat ⊢ i ≤ i + j
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

CommandDoccommentNode.comment: Variant of `List.Perm.drop` specifying the the permutation is constant before `i` elementwise. -/

AtomNode.val: Variant of `List.Perm.drop` specifying the the permutation is constant before `i` elementwise. -/

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), j < i → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? ⊢ List.drop i l₁ ~ List.drop i l₂
OtherNode.state_after: α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), j < i → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? ⊢ List.take i l₁ = List.take i l₂

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), j < i → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? ⊢ List.take i l₁ = List.take i l₂
OtherNode.state_after: case h α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), j < i → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? i✝ : Nat ⊢ (List.take i l₁)[i✝]? = (List.take i l₂)[i✝]?

OtherNode.state_before: case h α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), j < i → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? i✝ : Nat ⊢ (List.take i l₁)[i✝]? = (List.take i l₂)[i✝]?
OtherNode.state_after: case h α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), j < i → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? i✝ : Nat ⊢ (if i✝ < i then l₁[i✝]? else none) = if i✝ < i then l₂[i✝]? else none

OtherNode.state_before: case h α : Type u_1 l₁ l₂ : List α h : l₁ ~ l₂ i : Nat w : ∀ (j : Nat), j < i → l₁[j]? = l₂[j]? i✝ : Nat ⊢ (if i✝ < i then l₁[i✝]? else none) = if i✝ < i then l₂[i✝]? else none
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

Comment.text: -- Enforce naming conventions for index variables.
Variant of `List.Perm.take` specifying the the permutation is constant after `i` elementwise. -/
Variant of `List.Perm.drop` specifying the the permutation is constant before `i` elementwise. -/
